item.title: my first post
item.description: This is my new site welcome to my blog Tesla’s “$0 Marketing Budget” - Why Tesla Pays $0 for Their Marketing. Introduction Tesla Motors has no advertising, no ad agency, no CMO, no dealer network. Yet they have managed to create a household name and buzz in the market amongst millions of car lovers. Tell a story that resonates with individuals. Sharing a story, a vision and a mission is one of the most powerful ways to turn your customers into ambassadors.
